articles.title: Why U.K pop prince Sheeran judged 'American Idol' while Perry and Richie performed for King Charles - Yahoo Entertainment
articles.description: While two regular judges rubbed gilded elbows with the newly crowned royal couple at Windsor Castle, their 'Idol' thrones were filled by a ‘90s rock queen...
articles.content:
Alanis Morissette and Ed Sheeran fill in for Katy Perry and Lionel Richie on 'American Idol,' joining regular judge Luke Bryan. (Photo: ABC)
